function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Majority of respondents worked or studied from home","Impact":"Increased potential for contagious disease spread within households","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and ventilation systems in home workspaces","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, UV-C germicidal lamps","People":"People working or studying from home, households","Owner":"Homeowners, employers, building managers"},{"Description":"Struggle to organize adequate work/study space in living environment","Impact":"Increased stress and reduced productivity leading to potential mental health issues","Mitigation":"Provide guidance on ergonomic setup and create dedicated workspaces within living areas","Technologies":"Adjustable desks, ergonomic chairs, soundproof partitions","People":"People working or studying from home","Owner":"Employers, interior designers, architects"},{"Description":"Use of vacation properties for work/study during lockdown","Impact":"Potential for spreading disease to remote locations and among different communities","Mitigation":"Implement travel restrictions and quarantine protocols for individuals using vacation properties for work/study","Technologies":"Remote temperature monitoring, contact tracing apps","People":"Individuals using vacation properties for work/study","Owner":"Property owners, local authorities, public health agencies"}]}
